basics.name: Dongho Kang
basics.summary: Doctoral student of the computational robotics lab at ETH Zurich.

work.name: Computational Robotics Lab, ETH Zurich
highlights: Research topic: control algorithms for bio-inspired quadrupedal robots with natural and animal-like motion.

work.name: Robotic Systems Lab, ETH Zurich
highlights: Research topic: learning-based control methods for legged robots and physics engine for robotics applications.

work.name: NVIDIA Corp, Zurich, Switzerland
highlights: Project: deep learning-based Super-resolution and anti-aliasing methods.

education.institution: Seoul National University, Seoul, South Korea
education.area: Mechanical engineering and computer science (double major)
